original: @242b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @242b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: he badzro dbha ba ku ru kulle y'a panytsa ma ho pa de @243a * //
analyzed: he badzro dbha ba ku ru kulle y'a panytsa ma ho pa de @243a * //
translated: Hevajrodbhava-kurukulle-upade≈õa-pa√±ca-mahƒÅpade≈õa

original: sha: / bod skad du /
analyzed: sha: / bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i man ngag chen po lnga /
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i man ngag chen po lnga /
translated: The five great instructions of Kurukulle arisen from Hevajra

original: bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, Hevajra.

original: snying gi dbus las srog rlung mchog gis bskul bas rtsa dbus mchog gi nang zhugs gyen song zhing //
analyzed: snying gi dbus las srog rlung mchog gis bskul bas rtsa dbus mchog gi nang zhugs gyen song zhing //
translated: From the center of the heart, the supreme life-force wind is activated, entering the supreme central channel and ascending.

original: myur du spyi bo'i zla dbus las 'thon rim gyis gsal bar 'gro can mgo yi g-yon skor te //
analyzed: myur du spyi bo'i zla dbus las 'thon rim gyis gsal bar 'gro can mgo yi g-yon skor te //
translated: Quickly emerging from the center of the moon at the crown, gradually becoming clear, it moves to the left of the head,

original: g-yas kyi rna bug las 'thon myur du lag mda'i bu gar zhugs shing phyag rgya cher bsgoms nas //
analyzed: g-yas kyi rna bug las 'thon myur du lag mda'i bu gar zhugs shing phyag rgya cher bsgoms nas //
translated: emerging from the right ear, quickly entering the aperture of the thumb, and meditating on the great seal.

original: rdo rjes rab myur sa bon rgyal po bdag nyid 'od zer dmar po 'bar bas bsgrub bya yi //
analyzed: rdo rjes rab myur sa bon rgyal po bdag nyid 'od zer dmar po 'bar bas bsgrub bya yi //
translated: With the vajra, the extremely swift king of seed syllables, blazing with red light, the one to be accomplished

original: lag mda'i rtse mo'i bu ga rgyas byed sngon du 'gro bas sgra 'dzin bu gar rab zhugs shing //
analyzed: lag mda'i rtse mo'i bu ga rgyas byed sngon du 'gro bas sgra 'dzin bu gar rab zhugs shing //
translated: is pervaded by the aperture at the tip of the thumb, and the sound-grasping aperture is fully entered.

original: mgo yi g-yas kyi sna bug gsal bar 'gro ba can gyis snying gi mtsho skyes dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: mgo yi g-yas kyi sna bug gsal bar 'gro ba can gyis snying gi mtsho skyes dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: The wind, which is clear and goes out the right nostril of the head, quickly carries the hri·∏• to the heart, to the center of the lake-born lotus.

original: hr'i: sems myur du khyer nas rim bzhin rjes su lam de dang ni de nas 'thon nas ni //üîΩbrtan par snying dbus la gnas khyod kyis sa yi 'khor lo dang bcas lha ni dbang du sdud //
analyzed: hr'i: sems myur du khyer nas rim bzhin rjes su lam de dang ni de nas 'thon nas ni // brtan par snying dbus la gnas khyod kyis sa yi 'khor lo dang bcas lha ni dbang du sdud //
translated: Having gone out through that path, it goes to the heart center, where you should visualize it firmly.

original: gong bu dgug pa'o /
analyzed: gong bu dgug pa'o /
translated: This is the summoning of the aggregate.

original: // / sngar bzhin mda' las 'thon nas bsgrub bya'i mtsho skyes g-yon gyi ngos zhugs shing //
analyzed: // / sngar bzhin mda' las 'thon nas bsgrub bya'i mtsho skyes g-yon gyi ngos zhugs shing //
translated: Having gone out through the arrow, as before, it enters the left side of the lake-born lotus of the victim.

original: gyen du song ste spyi bo'i zla ba rim bzhin 'dzag byas sngar bzhin zhugs //
analyzed: gyen du song ste spyi bo'i zla ba rim bzhin 'dzag byas sngar bzhin zhugs //
translated: Having gone up, it falls from the moon of the crown, as before, and enters the heart.

original: mtsho skyes ze 'bru la gnas rnal 'byor pas ni brtan par bsgoms pa yis //
analyzed: mtsho skyes ze 'bru la gnas rnal 'byor pas ni brtan par bsgoms pa yis //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ should visualize it firmly in the center of the heart lotus.

original: chags pas 'dzag pa'i las kyis rgyal can ma yi skye bo myos par byed //
analyzed: chags pas 'dzag pa'i las kyis rgyal can ma yi skye bo myos par byed //
translated: The victim, who is intoxicated by the passion of the emission, is rendered senseless.

original: rkang pa dgug pa'o /
analyzed: rkang pa dgug pa'o /
translated: This is the summoning of the feet.

original: // / sprul gyis bzung ba'i snying ga'i zla dbus gnas pa gsal bar mthong nas de'i //
analyzed: // / sprul gyis bzung ba'i snying ga'i zla dbus gnas pa gsal bar mthong nas de'i //
translated: Having seen the moon in the heart, which is grasped by the snake, clearly in the center,

original: 'od zer bdud rtsi mang po'i rgyun gyi khrus kyis sprul gyi dug sel zhing //
analyzed: 'od zer bdud rtsi mang po'i rgyun gyi khrus kyis sprul gyi dug sel zhing //
translated: The many streams of light and nectar wash away the poison of the snake.

original: rtsa bug 'od zer gang ba las kyang dug 'joms 'od ldan zla dbus gnas //
analyzed: rtsa bug 'od zer gang ba las kyang dug 'joms 'od ldan zla dbus gnas //
translated: The light rays that fill the pores of the skin are also radiant and destroy the poison, abiding in the center of the moon.

original: de ltar sbrul gyis gzung ba la ni byams pas lha khyod dug ni 'joms //
analyzed: de ltar sbrul gyis gzung ba la ni byams pas lha khyod dug ni 'joms //
translated: Thus, O god, your love destroys the poison of one who is bitten by a snake.

original: sbrul gyi dug sel ba'o /
analyzed: sbrul gyi dug sel ba'o /
translated: This is the removal of the poison of a snake.

original: // / mar me brtan pa'i rnam pa can //
analyzed: // / mar me brtan pa'i rnam pa can //
translated: The form of a steady lamp

original: brtan por dmigs pa'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: brtan por dmigs pa'i sems kyis su //
translated: with a mind that is focused on stability,

original: lce yi rtse mor bsam byas na //
analyzed: lce yi rtse mor bsam byas na //
translated: one should visualize it at the tip of the tongue.

original: mi shes rab ril sel bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi shes rab ril sel bar 'gyur //
translated: The entire mass of ignorance will be removed.

original: shes rab 'phel ba'o /
analyzed: shes rab 'phel ba'o /
translated: This is the increase of wisdom.

original: // / gsal bar rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas shing lcags kyus snying la phug / ske la zhags pas bcings shing skra grol gcer bus g-yengs @243b pa can //
analyzed: // / gsal bar rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas shing lcags kyus snying la phug / ske la zhags pas bcings shing skra grol gcer bus g-yengs @243b pa can //
translated: The wind ma·πá·∏çala abides clearly, and the hook penetrates the heart. Bound by the noose around the neck, the hair is loose and naked.

original: lha mo khyod ni rnal 'byor stobs kyis nor 'dzin bkug nas ni //
analyzed: lha mo khyod ni rnal 'byor stobs kyis nor 'dzin bkug nas ni //
translated: O goddess, you summon the earth by the power of yoga,

original: bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing rtag tu khol po'i gnas skabs 'dzin //
analyzed: bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing rtag tu khol po'i gnas skabs 'dzin //
translated: and she falls at my feet and always maintains the state of a slave.

original: dmar po'i rnam can spros pa'i 'od kyi dra bas rnam par bcings //
analyzed: dmar po'i rnam can spros pa'i 'od kyi dra bas rnam par bcings //
translated: Bound by the net of light of the emanation of the form of red.

original: bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing skra grol lag gi mda' bsnun nas //
analyzed: bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing skra grol lag gi mda' bsnun nas //
translated: She falls at my feet, her hair loose, her hand holding an arrow,üîΩdrawn by the wind of the left, bound, and placed in the lotus of the lake.

original: g-yon pa'i rlung gis bkug ste bcings shing mtsho skyes nang du bcug / lte ba'i mtsho skyes dbus su zhugs te mos shing thal mo sbyar //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rlung gis bkug ste bcings shing mtsho skyes nang du bcug / lte ba'i mtsho skyes dbus su zhugs te mos shing thal mo sbyar //
translated: Having entered into the middle of the lotus of the navel, she is devoted and joins her palms.

original: sems dpa' padma las 'dzag khrag gis spyi bor khrus byas la //
analyzed: sems dpa' padma las 'dzag khrag gis spyi bor khrus byas la //
translated: The hero, having bathed her head with blood dripping from the lotus,

original: rnal 'byor pa des bsgoms na lha dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa des bsgoms na lha dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur //
translated: that yogi, meditating, will bring even the lord of gods under his control.

original: dbang du bsdu ba'o /
analyzed: dbang du bsdu ba'o /
translated: This is the subjugation.

original: // / kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i man ngag chen po lnga slob dpon zhi pa 'tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i man ngag chen po lnga slob dpon zhi pa 'tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The five great instructions of Kurukulla, arisen from Hevajra, composed by the master Santaraksita, are complete.

original: // / pandi ta h'a na sh'i la nyid kyis bsgyur ro /üîΩ// / aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: // / pandi ta h'a na sh'i la nyid kyis bsgyur ro / // / aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
translated: They were translated by the pandit Harisila himself.üîΩOm kuru kulle hri svha.

original: aom ku ru kulle aa mu ky'a: pandi ma a'a karsha ya hr'i: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle aa mu ky'a: pandi ma a'a karsha ya hr'i: sv'a h'a /
translated: Om kuru kulle amukaya pandita akarsaya hri svha.

original: aa mu kim s'a dhy'am a'a karasha ya /
analyzed: aa mu kim s'a dhy'am a'a karasha ya /
translated: I cause such and such to be attracted.

original: aa mu kim ba sh'im na ya /üîΩaa mu kam ba shyam ku ru /
analyzed: aa mu kim ba sh'im na ya / aa mu kam ba shyam ku ru /
translated: I cause such and such to be brought.üîΩI cause such and such to be done.üîΩI cause such and such to be done.

original: aa mu ka ba shya ku ru /üîΩma ma a'a kri shtam ku ru /
analyzed: aa mu ka ba shya ku ru / ma ma a'a kri shtam ku ru /
translated: I cause such and such to be destroyed.üîΩI cause such and such to be destroyed.

original: me a'a kri shti ku ru /
analyzed: me a'a kri shti ku ru /
translated: I cause such and such to be destroyed.üîΩHomage to the protectors.

original: a'atma kam a'a kri shtam ku ru /üîΩna mo m'am raksha /üîΩna mo me raksha ku ru na ma: na mo me sh'am tim ku ru na ma:/üîΩboo sha ta me pushti ku ru boo shta /
analyzed: a'atma kam a'a kri shtam ku ru / na mo m'am raksha / na mo me raksha ku ru na ma: na mo me sh'am tim ku ru na ma:/ boo sha ta me pushti ku ru boo shta /
translated: Homage to the protectors, do! Homage to the protectors, do! Homage to the bestower of peace, do!üîΩHomage to the bestower of prosperity, do!

original: ho de ba dattam me ba shyam ku ru ho: hr'i: de ba da ttam me a'a karsha ya h'i: dza: de ba da ttam me a'a karsha ya dza: me d'a ki ma ma d'a ki a'atma kam /
